an4.163:2.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, dukkha patipada dandhabhinna?
an4.163:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhanupassi kaye viharati, ahare patikulasanni, sabbaloke anabhiratisanni, sabbasankharesu aniccanupassi;
an4.163:2.3: maranasanna kho panassa ajjhattam supatthita hoti.
an4.163:2.4: So imani panca sekhabalani upanissaya viharati—
an4.163:2.8: So imesam pancannam indriyanam mudutta dandham anantariyam papunati asavanam khayaya.
an4.163:2.9: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkha patipada dandhabhinna.
an4.163:3.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, dukkha patipada khippabhinna?
an4.163:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhanupassi kaye viharati, ahare patikulasanni, sabbaloke anabhiratisanni, sabbasankharesu aniccanupassi;
an4.163:3.3: maranasanna kho panassa ajjhattam supatthita hoti.
an4.163:3.4: So imani panca sekhabalani upanissaya viharati—
an4.163:3.8: So imesam pancannam indriyanam adhimattatta khippam anantariyam papunati asavanam khayaya.
an4.163:3.9: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkha patipada khippabhinna.
an4.163:4.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, sukha patipada dandhabhinna?
an4.163:4.2: Idha bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati;
an4.163:4.3: vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati;
an4.163:4.4: pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajano sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati;
an4.163:4.5: sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.163:4.6: So imani panca sekhabalani upanissaya viharati—
an4.163:4.10: So imesam pancannam indriyanam mudutta dandham anantariyam papunati asavanam khayaya.
an4.163:4.11: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, sukha patipada dandhabhinna.
an4.163:5.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, sukha patipada khippabhinna?
an4.163:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati …pe… dutiyam jhanam …pe… tatiyam jhanam …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an4.163:5.3: So imani panca sekhabalani upanissaya viharati—
an4.163:5.7: So imesam pancannam indriyanam adhimattatta khippam anantariyam papunati asavanam khayaya.
an4.163:5.8: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, sukha patipada khippabhinna.
